https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/l0pNbodcAuION9cFXiPczBC3pBc.jpg The film will contrast the story of the legendary "Shadhin Bangla Football Team" with another from this era. The "Shadhin Bangla Football Team" was formed in 1971. They played matches around the country to donate money in the liberation war fund to help the freedom fighters. Damal
